subject: Triathlon
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: USA Triathlon is creating a task force of three physicians and two certified race directors to determine if anything more can be done to prevent deaths such as those that occurred at recent races in New York, Washington and Louisville, Ky.
snippet: USA Triathlon is creating a task force of three physicians and two certified race directors to determine if anything more can be done to prevent deaths such as those that occurred at recent races in New York, Washington and Louisville, Ky.
